data.event: The town center of Milford, where 8,835 people resided at the 2010 census, is defined as the Milford census-designated place (CDP), and is located at the junction of New Hampshire routes 13 and 101A.

event.title: remains "The Granite Town," although only one small quarry is in operation as of 2007

data.event: Its nickname remains "The Granite Town," although only one small quarry is in operation as of 2007.
